all_of_us_are_the_movement: All of us are the movement. We are participants together, not customers. As a participant you are in control of your personal information and you can delete your information when you want.
this_can_be_lengthy: This can be lengthy, but bare with us. We want you to know :)
this_information_is_stored_encrypted: This information is stored, encrypted and not seen by any other participant. Only the non-profit association sees this:
we_confirm_phone_numbers_to_increase_the: We confirm phone numbers to increase the safety of all participants in the movement.
this_info_is_only_visible_in_the_app_for: This information is only visible in the app for other participants:
your_social_media_information: Your social media information, if you choose to connect Twitter and/or Facebook
if_you_are_supporter_of_the_self_sustain: If you are supporter of the Self-Sustaining Garden on not.
the_number_of_experiences_you_have: The number of Experiences you have.
comments_you_make_in_closed_groups_are_o: Comments you make in closed groups are only seen for people in that group (how ever, rides in those groups are open).
rides_that_you_have_added_and_participat: Rides that you have added and participated in.
groups_that_you_have_added_and_participa: Groups that you have added and participated in.
experience_you_have_agreed_you_are_part_: Experiences you have agreed you are a part of.
when_you_choose_to_show_you_live_locatio: When you choose to show your live location (you are in control of how and when you do this)
the_information_you_provide_in_this_app_: The information you provide in this app is stored as long as the app exists or until you choose to delete it. You delete your information at the settings section of your profile.
only_the_non_profit_association_that_act: Only the non-profit association that acts as an enabler for the movement can see your phone number and e-mail. This information may be used to send you a newsletter or text message. Also, the system sometimes send you e-mails if you have forgotten your password or and Experience you're part of gets published.
skjutsgruppen_ideel_forening: Skjutsgruppen ideell förening (Skjutsgruppen non-profit association) is responsible for your personal informatino and Mattias Jägerskog is you contat at the association.
for_questions_to_the_association_email: For questions to the association e-mail hej@skjutsgruppen.nu
by_clicking_i_agree_you_agree: By clicking "I agree" you agree to our privacy policy.
read_all_of_the_privacy_policy_here: Read all of the privacy policy here
this_information_can_be_seen_by_other_pa: This information can be seen by other participants using the app and externally for people not part of the movement:
we_recommend_you_to_sign_up_with_faceboo: We recommend you sign up with Facebook or Twitter.
we_will_never_publish_without_you_knowin: We will never publish to Facebook or Twitter without you knowing.
sign_up_the_long_way: Or sign up the long way, it's fine as well.
your_email_is_confirmed_fill_first_and_l: Your e-mail is confirmed! Now you fill in your first and last name.
need_to_do_is_confirm_cellphone_and_done: All you need to do now is to confirm your cellphone number and you’re done!
you_will_confirm_by_sending_a_text_messa: You will confirm by sending a text message with your unique code, from the phone you’re seeing this on right now  - to our number
the_text_message_costs: The text message costs the same as an ordinary text message with your service provider.
welcome_you_are_now_participating: Welcome {{firstName}}! You are now participating in the non-profit ridesharing movement Skjutsgruppen!
press_enter_to_start_looking_around_and_: Press enter to start looking around and say hi to other participants.
we_are_friends_of_friends_of_friends: We are friends and friends of friends.
we_share_equally_of_offer_each_other_rid: We share equally of offer each other rides for free. Because friends dont make money of friends.
by_clicking_i_agree_you_agree_to_partici: By clicking "I agree" you agree to our participatory agreement.
read_all_of_the_agreement_here: Read all of the agreement here
go_to_your_email_and_enter_the_confirmat: Go to your e-mail {{email}} and enter the confirmation code we've sent you.
you_cannot_proceed_without_confirming_yo: You can not proceed without confirming your e-mail. Did something go wrong? Press "Back" and start over.
or_signup_with_fb_or_twitter_instead: Or sign up with Facebook or Twitter instead.
did_something_go_wrong_press_back: Did something go wrong? Press “Back” and start over.
the_system_is_waiting_for_your_text_mess: The system is waiting for your text message.
we_love_to_see_each_other_and_a_photo: We love to see each other and a photo of you adds trust!
in_this_app_you_can_offer_your_spare_sea: In this app you can offer your spare seats to others or ask for a ride.
add_or_join_groups_for_a_specific_distan: Add or join groups for a specific distance, an area or a subject.
login_with_fb_twitter_or_your_email: Log in with Facebook, Twitter or your e-mail or cell phone number.
you_can_use_your_cellphone_number_or_ema: Use your cellphone number or email to log in.
an_email_will_be_sent_to_your_address: A link to reset your password will be sent to the email address you provide below.
number_already_confirmed_description: This number is already confirmed by {{firstName}} {{lastName}}, with e-mail {{email}}.
go_to_log_in: If this is you, go to login. If something went wrong you can start over.
will_reset_your_session: Are you sure you want to go back? This will reset your current session.
new_number: It seems you are using new phone number. Do you want to update your phone number?
now_you_will_sync_your_phone_book: Now you will sync your phone book to increase trust and security.
you_will_be_able_to_send_your_live_locat: You will be able to send your live location with SMS (text message) to your friends and family so they can follow your ride.
you_will_also_see_how_you_know_all_the_o: You will also see how you know all the other participants.
if_you_and_another_participant_has_each_: If you and another participant has each others phone numbers in your phone books, you are connected as friends (you can adjust this at any time).
contact_permission: We want to trust you. In this movement we trust each other by showing how we know each other. If you and another participant has each others phone numbers you are connected as friends (as always, you have full control and can delete friend connections).
